time I have done different tasks depending on the need and my talents This allowed me to learn several roles and use that to guide other projects and groups to provide the best support to my Firm Manage ITrelated projects this included such things as Coordinated new office locations or current office site moves Deployment of new enterprise wide software or hardware solutions Evaluating and
